name: FSB: Secret Operations
description:
Border guards patrolled the Russian border. They saw and detained the criminals. The criminals wanted to transport a large batch of weapons and ammunition to the territory of Russia.

FSB officers held special events and found that the bandits were delivering weapons to Russia from the former Soviet military airfield. The airfield is located in Eastern Europe.

The FSB leadership decided to establish the place from where the weapons were delivered to the military airfield.

You are an employee of the Office of Special Operations of the FSB of Russia. Your task: install special GPS/GLONASS tracking units on planes, helicopters, trucks and minivans. You need to check the hangars and find containers with weapons. If you find containers, then place GPS/GLONASS tracking unit on them.
